channel.description: Recent content in cms on Lucas Neves Pereira

item.title: Connect custom Strapi API to an Angular App
item.description: I recently decided to rebuild my portfolio with Angular. The problem is that I wanted to easily post and update my projects, I first thought about build an NodeJS/Express API connected with MongoDB but this can be time consuming for me knowing that I have others side projects with a lot of work to do. I decided to take a look into headless CMS, that’s when I find out aboutStrapi.
